full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SPYANG KHU'I BSANGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES PA 'DI NI SPYANG GI GNOD PA CHEN LA SEMS CAN THAMS CAD BYAMS PA SNYING RJE SEMS BSKYED LA @005A *, ,MAH'A KA LA SPRUL SKU GSUM SKYES SHIS RIN PO CHE BLA MA BSKUL BA'I NGOR, AER TE NI CHOS RJE BDUN SKYES SHIS SPRUL SKU LCAM SRING GI ZHAL GZIGS BYUNG BA BLA MAS 'GRO BA PHYUGS LA CE SPYANG GI KHRO BO CHEN POS DON ZHES BYA LA SHIN TU RNYED DKA' SLAD DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG RAB BRTAN NI SBYAR BA'O, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
